plot: George Platt is a lawyer who lives with his family in a middle-class neighborhood in a New Jersey suburb. The Platt's, George and Liz, have three teenagers, Muff, Kenny and Andrea.
plot_en: George Platt is a lawyer who lives with his family in a middle-class neighborhood in a New Jersey suburb. The Platt's, George and Liz, have three teenagers, Muff, Kenny and Andrea.
plot_es: George Platt is a lawyer who lives with his family in a middle-class neighborhood in a New Jersey suburb. The Platt's, George and Liz, have three teenagers, Muff, Kenny and Andrea.
title: We'll Get By
